import React, {useState} from 'react' function LoginForm({Login, error}) { const [details, setDetails]= useState({neptun:"", name:"", password:""}); const submitHandler = e => { e.preventDefault(); Login(details); } return (

Login


setDetails({...details, neptun: e.target.value})} value={details.neptun}>

setDetails({...details, name: e.target.value})} value={details.name}>

setDetails({...details, password: e.target.value})} value={details.password}>
) } export default LoginForm
